short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that helps you avoid the endless scrolling of short-form content by:
• Blocking YouTube Shorts from your feed and sidebar
• Hiding Instagram Reels from your feed and navigation
• Toggle blocking on/off with easy switches
• Works seamlessly on both platforms
